info.name: sbh_87_check_to_create_inbound_include_uom_product
info.description:
### Testsuite: Create inbound with uom product

Testcase:

1. Login seller account
2. Get info:
    1. ProductUI / Get all products - had uom
    2. Warehouse UI / Product / Get all products in stock - had uom != ''
    3. Warehouse UI / Product / Get all sku in stock - had uom
    4. Warehouse UI / Product / Get product stock summary
    5. Sổ kho / Get po detail list
    6. Sổ kho / Get po summary
    7. Sổ nhập hàng / Get list import po (type = in)
    8. Contact / Get list contact
    9. Contact / Get contact's dept amount
    10. Get payment_source_id
3. Create inbound to increase products in stock (uom gốc)
4. Check info:
    1. Sổ nhập hàng / Check list import po => increase 1
    2. Sổ nhập hàng / Check new import po detail
    3. Sổ kho / Check po detail list => increase total items
    4. Sổ kho / Check po summary
    5. ProductUI / Get all products => check
    6. Warehouse UI / Product / Get all products in stock => check
    7. Warehouse UI / Product / Get product stock summary => check
    8. Contact / Check contact's dept amount
5. Create inbound to increase products in stock (uom != uom gốc)
6. Check info:
    1. Sổ nhập hàng / Check list import po => increase 1
    2. Sổ nhập hàng / Check new import po detail
    3. Sổ kho / Check po detail list => increase total items
    4. Sổ kho / Check po summary
    5. ProductUI / Get all products => check
    6. Warehouse UI / Product / Get all products in stock => check
    7. Warehouse UI / Product / Get product stock summary => check
    8. Contact / Check contact's dept amount

Note: will handle case 5, 6 laster
